document.full_text: a mummified body believed to be that of an early playboy playmate has been found in a dilapidated beverly hills home after evidently being undiscovered for up to a year, authorities said on monday.
document.title: mummified playboy playmate found in los angeles
lines_and_colors: a mummified body believed to be that of an early playboy playmate has been found in a dilapidated beverly hills home after evidently being undiscovered for up to a year, authorities said on monday.
